messages.initial: I'm NachUI Bot. How can I assist you today?
messages.error: I'm sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.
messages.helperText: Press Enter to send, Shift + Enter for new line

suggestions.title: Try asking:
suggestions.subtitle: Click on any suggestion to get started

openIn.label: Open in
openIn.prompt:
I'm looking at this documentation: {url}.
Help me understand how to use it. Be ready to explain concepts, give examples, or help debug based on it.
